Text: Financial Data Warehouse Update Cc As you may be aware we have experienced delays in completing our latest release of the Sunrise Financial Data Warehouse which will include APAR and earnings information We are now doing our final quality checks and expect that the new content and standard reports will be available no later than November You will soon be receiving a communication with instructions on how to utilize the new features If you have any questions please contact ISC customer care at Project Sunrise

Financial Data Warehouse Not Available on Monday Cc On Friday night routine hardware maintenance was started on the Project Sunrise Financial Data Warehouse The work was scheduled to complete on Sunday but problems were encountered with a bad memory board on the database server The vendor was called and replacement hardware was delivered and installed on Sunday The restore is currently running and is scheduled to complete around pm today Monday If the estimated completion time changes we will update you We apologize for any inconvenience this causes
